SEARCH
Package Models

Class Map

java.lang.Object
Models.Map
public class Map extends Object
Represents a map in a map-based application, including continents, countries, and their connectivity.

      public void removeCountry(String p_countryName) throws InvalidMap

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Exception

    • Validate

      public Boolean Validate() throws InvalidMap
      Validates the map, checking for various conditions including null objects, continent connectivity, and country connectivity.
      Returns:
      true if the map is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if the map is invalid, providing details about the specific issue.

    • checkForNullObjects

      public Boolean checkForNullObjects() throws InvalidMap
      Checks for null objects within the map, including continents, countries, and their neighbors.
      Returns:
      true if there are no null objects, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if null objects are found, providing details about the specific issue.

    • checkContinentConnectivity

      public Boolean checkContinentConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Checks connectivity within continents, ensuring each continent forms a connected subgraph.
      Returns:
      true if continent connectivity is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if there are issues with continent connectivity.

    • subGraphConnectivity

      public boolean subGraphConnectivity(Continent p_continent) throws InvalidMap
      Performs depth-first search (DFS) on a subgraph within a continent to check connectivity.
      Parameters:
      p_continent - the continent to check for connectivity.
      Returns:
      true if the subgraph is connected, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if there are issues with the subgraph connectivity.

    • dfsSubgraph

      public void dfsSubgraph(Country p_c, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> p_continentCountry, Continent p_continent)
      Performs depth-first search (DFS) on a subgraph within a continent to determine connectivity.
      Parameters:
      p_c - the starting country for DFS.
      p_continentCountry - a map to track visited countries within the subgraph.
      p_continent - the continent containing the subgraph.

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_continentName) throws InvalidMap
      Carries out the "Remove Continent" operation on the map, which involves deleting the specified continent along with its countries and associated data from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_continentName - Continent Name to be found
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - Exception

    • checkCountryConnectivity

      public boolean checkCountryConnectivity() throws InvalidMap
      Checks connectivity among all countries in the map.
      Returns:
      true if country connectivity is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if there are issues with country connectivity.

    • dfsCountry

      public void dfsCountry(Country p_c) throws InvalidMap
      Performs depth-first search (DFS) on the entire country graph to check connectivity.
      Parameters:
      p_c - the starting country for DFS.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if there are issues with country connectivity.

    • getAdjacentCountry

      public List<Country> getAdjacentCountry(Country p_country) throws InvalidMap
      Gets a list of adjacent countries for a given country.
      Parameters:
      p_country - the country to retrieve adjacent countries for.
      Returns:
      a list of adjacent countries.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if the specified country doesn't have any adjacent countries.

      p_neighbourName - Country to be removed as neighbor

    • updateNeighboursCont

      public void updateNeighboursCont(Integer p_targetCountryId)
      Removes a particular country as a neighbor from all associated countries within continent objects. This operation is typically used when deleting a country object.
      Parameters:
      p_targetCountryId - Country to be removed

    • removeCountryNeighboursFromAll

      public void removeCountryNeighboursFromAll(Integer p_targetCountryId)
      Eliminates a particular country as a neighbor from all associated countries within the map's country list. This operation is typically employed when deleting a country object.
      Parameters:
      p_targetCountryId - Country to be removed
